What features of this product appeal to: As a teacher, I value products that are easy to use and don't require a lot of maintenance. Finally, I would want to make sure that the online and mobile banking tools are user-friendly and secure, as I value convenience but also want to make sure my personal information is protected.

Overall, I think the Savings Accelerator is a great product, but having additional resources or customization options would make it even more appealing to me.
